column3: Number of energy bins per decade.
Coordinate system of the spatial projection (CEL or GAL).
Number of energy bins.  If none this will be inferred from energy range and ``binsperdec`` parameter.
Order of the map (int between 0 and 12, included)
Number of pixels in the x and y direction.  If none then this will be set from ``roiwidth`` and ``binsz``.
Width of the ROI in degrees.  The number of pixels in each spatial dimension will be set from ``roiwidth`` / ``binsz`` (rounded up).
